root.message: The COMPILING_ORG field for indicator 9-4-1, translated into all languages

languages.language:
Data compilers

Name:

UNIDO, IEA

Description:

IEA provides data on total CO2 emissions, CO2 emissions/GDP, manufacturing CO2 emissions.

UNIDO compiles the data using its source for MVA data and IEA for data on CO2 emissions.
